title: application Pack
extract: HR, FINANCE a form that you complete in order to apply for a job, a place on a course, etc. or to get something such as a loan or a licence: complete/fill in/fill out an application form Sometimes you will be required to fill in an application form which will be used to select candidates for interview.
extract_html: HR, FINANCE a form that you complete in order to apply for a job, a place on a course, etc. or to get something such as a loan or a licence: complete/fill in/fill out an application form Sometimes you will be required to fill in an application form which will be used to select candidates for interview.
